message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.LG, cs.DM. 

The paper deals with the problem of testing whether an unknown Boolean function is a $k$-junta in the distribution-free property testing model. This problem is related to information theory (cs.IT) as it involves measuring the distance between functions with respect to an unknown probability distribution. The paper also involves the study of algorithms and their query complexity, which falls under the categories of data structures (cs.DS), computational complexity (cs.CC), and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the problem of testing juntas is related to property testing (cs.DM).
